TEXT.FORM: thamtham nɤkinɯ, iɕqha nɯ, jinde tɕe, tɯ-ji kɤ-ɕlu nɯnɯ, jla kɯ ɲɯ́-wɣ-z-rɤɕi ʁɟa ʑo tú-wɣ-ɕlu pɯ-ra ri, tham tɕe @xuangengji 旋耕机 tɤ-tu tɕe, @xuangengji kɯ tu-sɯ-ɕlu-nɯ ɲɯ-khɯ tɕe, tɕendɤre jla mɯ́j-ra tɕe, jla nɯ ɲɯ-nɯ-ntsɣe-nɯ tɕe, ɲɯ-ɣɤme-nɯ tɕe, (015) tɕe nɯ tham rcanɯ, iʑo mɯŋi ra, "jla ɯ-di cinɤ mɯ-nɯ-nɤmnɤm-i" nɯra tu-ti-nɯ tɕe, mu ʑo nɯ-me, tɯ-rdoʁ cinɤ nɯ-me kɤ-ti nɯ tɕe, "ɯ-di kɯnɤ mɯ-nɯ-nɤmnɤm-i" tu-ti-nɯ ŋgrɤl. tɕe nɯnɯ tɕe maka ʑo nɯ-me kɤ-ti tɕe, nɯnɯ nɤkinɯ, ɯ-χpi kɯ-fse ku-ta-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu.
